price: ߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߒ ߓߘߊ߫ ߒ ߞߊ߬ߙߌ߬ߝߊ߬ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߣߴߊߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߞߊߣߊ߬ ߒ ߞߙߎ߬ߟߊ߬ߓߏ߲߫
arabic: وَإِنِّي عُذۡتُ بِرَبِّي وَرَبِّكُمۡ أَن تَرۡجُمُونِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-innī ʿudh'tu birabbī warabbikum an tarjumūni
